author: Simple History
description:
This video was made possible thanks to everyone on the Simple History Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/simplehistory

Once the first global superpower, the Portuguese Empire built vast trade networks from Brazil to Africa, India, and Japan — then collapsed. Discover how Portugal rose through exploration and naval innovation, dominated world trade, and why its empire ultimately fell.

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
Discord server: https://discord.gg/JZsPQXHeYC

title: How Did The Portuguese Empire Collapse?
